author: Hideyuki Saito
description: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.*Special ingredient #1: Tomato and vanilla syrup made by heating 200ml tomato water with 200g sugar. Cool, then add 100ml vanilla syrup
name: La Blanca

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
<strong>*Special ingredient #1<strong>: Tomato and vanilla syrup made by heating 200ml tomato water with 200g sugar
